tool_description:
Get the API of live score(faster than crickbuzz) of all the cricket matches absolutely FREE and will be FREE forever. Cricket Odds Score and Live Stream of Matches also available.

Contact Developer for unlimited access: 

WhatsApp: +91 7408157036 
Email: sudityakumar1@gmail.com 
Website: https://sudityashrivastav.vercel.app/
name: Free Cricket Live Score
title: Free Cricket Live Score

api_list.name: all-odds
api_list.description:
On this endpoint you will get the list of all available odds list.

Contact Developer:-
WhatsApp:- +91 7408157036
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-cricket-live-score1.p.rapidapi.com/odds/odds-list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-cricket-live-score1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
